values:
I'm still alive! I haven't been on livejournal in almost a year! It's crazy how everything started out here, and now myspace has pretty much taken over. What do I do on-line? Check my messages on my myspace..and check my inbox on my yahoo account I've had since I was 11. :)
I am 21 now.
I have been through a lot since June of '04

So, what do I have to show for my aging?..slow progress.
No degree. :(
No place of my own :(
No kids :)
No marriage :)
NO Bad Habit :)
A Car that starts every time!!! :) (knock on wood**)
A caring family :)
A person who says part of their soul will always be with me. (I wish I could tell them the same, because thats exactly how I feel.) :)
A pill to make you numb. A pill to make you dumb. A pill to make you anybody else. But all the drugs in this world..wont save her from herself..

Thinking about some stuff.
Today I played a little soccer..and watched a game at Kasch Park after work. yeah...a 9pm game. gotta love the late ones. Im thinking about joining an adult co-ed team..i gotta get my players card. i wonder if the boys would want to when they get back from egypt? idk. i sure miss them..
i love cory though. i figure..hes probably the best BEST friend I've ever had..well..in awhile. guy friend that is. I mean KZ and Justin are too..but they arent around right now. Im glad that they are having a good time..sigh.

in other news. its kind of a relief to be 20.

im struggling with some emotional stuff right now. Nothing real severe. just loneliness..nostalgia..boredom..

Thanks. 
Cory- For free cable.
:)

and..
a couple people who have surprised called me! Made my night.

Someone called me tonight also..
:)

So, its 4 am, and i'm on my third drink. OH NO. Anyways..
I forgot I was going to say something important.
Oh yeah.
I might be going on a trip somewhere in September. :)
that would be nice, right before school starts.
yeah..a place ive been before..but we'll see in a couple weeks.

So, I absolutely..still love the movie "Shes the Man". I have to watch it every night. Cory is on his way here..(BECAUSE..0.o, its my birthday!!)..
woohoo. the big 2-0. Anyways..
I'm going to play soccer again. ASAP. <3

Ive wanted to play. Work gets in my way.
FUCK YOU WORK.
<3 money..and transportation..and a life? :) I guess that makes a life...
does it? mmmm..material possessions. YUCK.

Its my birthday..woot. .... ..         .. Not the same. Last year..it kicked ass..So I think? lol.. BLACK OUT..Never again though.
Which reminds me..

For my birthday..I want COMPLETE happiness. Is that impossible? Well..a pimple already seems to be ruining it for me! ARRG.

My favorite movie in the world is Shes the Man..with Amanda Bynes. It made me realize how much I miss soccer..and how much soccer was my entire world. The love story in it..makes me sad too. But I want to play soccer again so bad..
:(

Alright.
So, I went to Rhiannons wedding reception..
I knew navy guys would be there..and I knew that I'd click with someone..
but for some reason..
I am so tired of those "player"..i'm so white sometimes..anyways..TYPES.
This guy was pretty hot. We eyed eachother when I arrived at the Church for the wedding..and I knew that something might happen..
I mean attempts were continuous..but he was trying to decide between me and someone else.. I guess I shouldn't have handed him a garner(sp) snake..But still..LOL
blah. later that night he tried grabbing my shoulder and having me sit next to him..but i slapped his hand..
wanna know why?
Because he suggested I take him out on the dance floor..and I just smiled..but I walked away to go change out of my dress..and It took me for EVER of course..the whole YMCA song..to unzip and change into something more comfortable..anyways..i walk back to the covered area..and I see him on the dance floor with this other girl (she will remain nameless) i was sad.
but oh well.
shit happens.

im tired of looking in all the wrong places.

Lice is disgusting.
Good thing I don't have it.
hahahaha

ok. the wedding was fun..
the reception was fun..
the after hours sucked.

racist sexist pig from texas who is 26..dating a woman who is 42..hes half an ass..and kind of nice..once i argued with him for an hour..

ended up buying me advil, food, and taking me to an atm. muahaha.
but still. i wanted to punch him in the face.
he referred to black people as coons..
and when he said that..i said
if you're referring to RACOOONS. no i dont see any anywhere.
i wanted to knock him off his ass. 

ill get into detail later..about other stuff.

A sneak attack..
Under the knee..
past the ankle.

Mosquito, come bite me..!





I really enjoy what I read in someone elses entry. I'm too shy to comment though. 
Hint: you always smelled great.

I am going to Rhiannons wedding on Saturday. I am a little nervous, but excited to go to my first wedding. :D I went to her bachelorette, and omg..it was a blast. I'm so glad she invited me..because I have only a couple good girlfriends. That might change..because of the awesome women at work! Anyways, I really miss Kareem and Justin, and I'm really excited for the rest of the summer. I have great things to look forward to in August..and I love my job. I've been there for 10 months tomorrow! yay. 

I still have to get my friend Chivahn to cut my hair soon. I haven't called her..but it pays to have a friend in beauty school (again)..I'm gonna give her 15 bucks, depends on how good..and it's nothing too extravagant(SP)..

I still like Dmitry..but I don't know. Would I like him..if he was single? Probably, but I <3 Amy..and I'm hanging out with her Friday..WTH, I see her every weekend. :-P.

My birthday is in 6, almost 5 days!! WOOT.

This week is a "girls" week. 
The story of the day would be..

It was my last break today. I was walking towards the lunch room at work, with my co-worker Jeff. I was explaining to him that all I wanted was some cookies, or chocolate ice cream. Something sweet!..you know? because I didn't eat dinner earlier..(my work schedule is 1-9:30..pm) my last break is at 7...I didn't eat dinner because I felt sick..so all I ate was some easy mac...earlier..and a tiny bowl of cereal..That might be a lot to some people..but I eat a lot at 3 usually..
anywho..I wanted the cookies..so I told Jeff that I was going to go to my car to get some change..well 
I walk back to the lunch room..find the cookies I wanted were completely out..there werent any left in the vending machine..well I walk around the corner and theres Jeff..eating the f'n cookies I wanted. 
I didn't tell him SPECIFICALLY that I wanted those cookies..but 
I BURST INTO TEARS 5 minutes LATER..when I told my friends Haley and Jen. :( 
I can't believe I cried over cookies..but it really made me mad. The guy never gets those cookies..it really annoyed me..
I cried for a good two-three minutes..and let everyone see. lol. It was great. 
I still haven't talked to Jeff. He is kind of irritating me. Jeff is this 30 year old guy, who kind of likes me..and it kind of grosses me out, but he is nice to talk to. blahck. anywho..that wwas my EMOTIONAL DAY. lol

that, and I don't know. 
something else. 
Shavi & my mom told me some news today.

This weekend was kind of eventful.
I went to Amy's house, and Dmitry called me while I was at work.
So, I did a friend a favor and picked this girl Sarah up, who actually seems like she might be a good friend...well the guy gave me a couple hits from his blunt..so that was nice. She is a scorpio..sorry just had to throw that bit in there. Anyways, So, I picked some vodka and rum up after work Friday, headed over to Amys place in Ballard, (AWESOME BTW)..and met the new roommate Tommy-Anne..lol..Amy thought it was Tambian..and I heard Cambian over the phone..so we just call her. T.A. Well, we had plans to all three go to Jakubs party..but he was outta town in Olympia (jakub is amys old sailing mate)..and he goes to UW. Well that fell through and we decided to go to T.A.'s friends party..(her ex) but he didnt answer his phone..so we ended up going to Dmitrys friends party..yes..I ended up with Dmitry that night..again. 
Yes, this is the guy that has a girlfriend guys..
blah....why me? 
I can't stop. Anyways, us three girls ended up in three different places..during the night. And i ended up in getting in a blow out with some guy who spilled beer on me. What I didn't realize was that the entire house was a russian sausage fest. lol hahaha
and i dug around in a couch..there is a lot more that happened...but i just felt like typing some of it down..so i can think clearly.

Cory is on his way here..I want to take a sleeping pill and pass out.

I miss you guys. :) Yes, the ppl who have lj

I've met someone.
I've met someone who seems like they would be a good friend, but...well, there is something more. 

They have a girlfriend.

& I am pretty interested.

Out of the NORM. I usually stay away.

In other news,

My job is something I'll never get tired of. I don't care about going. I don't really rush getting anywhere after work..I'm content. Its always like this. The people there are another family to me.

I plan on working there for another year, maybe two?
I plan on getting my associates degree whenever I feel like taking the (hard) math classes. I struggle with math..Always have, always will. 
I don't like the homework. My mind doesnt work with numbers, it works with words. I memorize locations..and I don't really read instructions..because they have steps..which include numbers.


I am going to be athletic again..which means..20 hrs of cardiovascular exercise a week. I am trying to lose at least 8 lbs, and start building more muscle mass..and sculpt my body. I am pretty determined, and very motivated. I am actually very excited. Problem is..when classes start..where will I be? I won't think about it. My best friend wont be at EvCC anymore.

END

Hi everyone, I haven't been on live journal in probably months..maybe a year. I don't really know. I just felt like signing on. I used to post quite a bit. I might start posting more, I might search for more people..but myspace seems to be the best way to go about contacting friends..but I think I might start using this more for myself. I sometimes feel like I need to write/type..a lot.. But I just don't really know where.

I have been thinking a lot about how my friends have moved either out of snohomish county..or just out of Everett..it makes me sad, but I see them whenever I want. Thank goodness for cars!
:)
Anyways, TOODELOO! If anyone even reads this. 

I talk a lot..
IRL
not just gibberish..just a lot. I have been confiding in a particular person at work..and I thank them for being who they are.

I haven't tried updating in quite a while.
I work.
I wake up.

I go to sleep. 
in and out. i inhale caffeine, like breathing oxygen. only for 8.5 hours though.

Its february.
:) a fresh new start...
well at least for a new month. 

I love you. =)

For some reason..I always feel better when I face a day at work..rather then when I face a day at anything else. School will be starting real soon, and you know what? I'm excited.
I want to leave some stuff behind. 

BRING ON WORK. I like working at Burger King.
call me up

I'm like an irate raving ex girlfriend...though I am not an ex of you..and I'm only jealous of a good time that can be spent in the presence of others. 

If that makes any sense. 

I'm tired of wallowing (sp). I have to work today at 4..and I guess I'm so used to working that its better than thinking.

I'm switching doctors. Dominoe effect of several things is fucking up some sort of chemical balance..and a bunch of major organs...and their functions.

I felt better talking to a best friend. They may be staying the night..due to the fact that kenmore is no longer a place that you want to be at alone.
I havent talked to Amy in a couple weeks. Maybe 1 or 2..besides online...
My two "close" girlfriends have boyfriends..so their time is all but consumed.
Im jealous that their boyfriends have stolen away their free time..

My supervisor flashed me last night..and I had it on my camera phone. lol. but then i deleted it...because it was kind of strange.

question of the day "you'd tell me if you were bi-sexual mara, wouldn't you?"
of course. i dont have a problem sharing anything..but STDS. 
ok. 
if anyone wants to spend time hanging out call me
3438445

All of my muscles relax..when I finish speaking to you on the phone. They only begin to relax when we start.

I am at ease..

 

Anyways.

I find myself doing some more mid night shopping. I've been feeling "Ok". :) but...

I picked up a few more randoms.

Last night at Walmart it was a 4 pack of dbl a batteries. a portable cd player..and a kelly clarkson cd.

tonight: some dietary supplement pills, toothbrush, some teeth whitener..red finger nail polish, some hair dye..and..

A BACK ACHE.

I like mid night shopping. At least this time I didn't have to do it alone. I drug my sister a long.

but..

All of this came to mind when I started falling asleep to some Da Rude.

I miss Kareem, Justin, Amy, Cory, Josh, Kendra, and my family.

At 12:46 am i randomnly decided itd be best to go to wal mart. so i strutted around for approx. forty minutes alone carrying what i felt like buying.

 

earlier..around 10..i bought the kelly clarkson cd. and almost saw an unrecognizable allan (rachels ex)..

and around 1ish am i saw nguyen phoung

tomorrow i work 12 hrs. sunday i work maybe 5. monday i work 12 hrs. tuesday i work 7. and i get my money for being alive.

 

I like him. Why not say something? Because he already knows.

He says he knows me.

NO PROBLEMS.

Just EMO. why? WHY?

 

cause

IM BARELY HANGING ON..

here i am once again..im torn into pieces. cant deny it, cant pretend...

 

I told you everything..opened up and let you in..you made me feel alright..for once in my life..now all thats left of me..is what i pretend to be..so together..but so broken up inside..cause i cant breathe..no i cant sleep..im barely hangin on..HERE I AM once again..Im torn into pieces..cant deny it..cant pretend..just thought you were the one..broken up deep inside..but you wont get to see the tears i cry..
BEHIND THESE HAZEL EYES.

I cant help but feel groggy every morning. I can't help but wonder if this part of my life is going to pass me by..and I am going to grow UP. Or I think to myself: AM I ever just going to take some initiative..and PUSH my way through..maybe ignore the egging.

I can't help but like it. but IT is not at all worth it.
WHY AM I SETTLING? I've gotten this far..

mini steps

 

IN OTHER NEWS. I AM EXCITED..TODAY IS MY DAY OFF. I am glad that you text me yesterday.

CAT AND MOUSE..

 

You're the riddle..

I slept more than enough last night.

Since you been gone..

umm..I  think I like Kelly Clarkson a little too much :x

work sucks. anyone agree?
 at least you get money..right....right??? >:) lol
anyways.
sigh

thanks for taking those pictures rachel :)
sorry we didnt stick around the other night. kind of tired.


i love my friends

A Happy Birthday is what I had. Thanks to my bestfriends.
Too bad I got so drunk, SO plastered, there is a part...probably the best part of the night..that I can't completely remember. Thanks to those who came to my day. :)

i forgot to mention..i'll be gone all day saturday (Tomorrow) i am  kayaking :)  in the san juans
you know what sucks? I miss amy cory kareem justin and josh.
and guess what? im stayin at the kenmore house tomorrow night..since i half live there
and half live here in msvl..and go to school in everett? does that make sense at all? lol
anywho. i miss my darlings.
now i must go to bed

catch up on my math sometime
and wake up at 5:30 ish to catch my 8 o clock ferry blahhhhhhhhhhhhhhhh

So. Update again. Work sucks.
did you know..working for Tulalip..(their minimum wage..is 13.00 an hour?) yeah
wtf am i doing at bk and tdm? who knows

i paid 100 on my phone bill (I feel a lot better now)

sort of.. lol


ok. so much shit i want to do
i want to move down town with amy cory and josh (seattle) near capitol hill or cornish.

yah yah yah. i really do because?? well cory said i can use his car anytime..or he might sell it to me?? and well...what??! huh?? anyways..

blah. too much to think about
i just want to pay off my bills FULLY
and get my car a runnin' :( 
i'll do the best i can do for now.

END

working a lot.

kind of mentally fucked feeling

just..missin'.

So, they said I probably have TB. :(

haha only kidding. I've been workin' like a lil' bitch. I saw Joe Duke today..for the first time since uhh probably Junior Year or Graduation? :D Weird, weird.

Today: I was able to hang out with Amy for a little while..totally got the hook up at the Food Court at the new outlet malls by this guy who said we were "rock stars"..although we both looked like a 4.9 on a scale from 1-11 lol. jk jk.

I got my hair cut today. It was pretty cheap. $16 plus 4 dollah tip yo! I was like hmm..interesting. hmm..

I also got a pair of flip flops and some fuel in my tool. (truckzie) its nice having a wee bit of money.

made 3.40 cents in tips tonite..and learned to work Tdms reg. i usually work the reg. at BK but..i havent worked there in days! kind of relieved.

i have the next two days off. (tues/wed) goin' to corys grad. on wed. :D yayers for him.

i miss several people right now.

ever get in a fight with someone because you supposedly or accidentally got bengay on their jacket? hehe i did.

im still in denial..i really dont think i did it..but then again i was plastered..like stucco to a wall..two different things but..you get where i'm comin from :-P

if you don't..TOO  BAD.

mommy mommy came into my work today. of course..as usual..
"OMG, this can't be your mom!!"

"umm..yeah..its..or rather she is my mommy"

"You look like sisters!!"

"nope..thats my daughter''-mom

"yeahp..thats my mom"

LATER ON

"I hope I don't offend you by saying your mom is hot": co-worker mike. hahahahahaa

he also later said she is amazing..

which i already know :D

 

the cold i have makes me sound quite manly

Whats does your personality rate from 1-10? by morning_prayer
Your first full name
Your personality rates a-10,000,000 damn you suck
your best quality isyoure responsible
your worst quality isI dont know...nothing?
this is becauselifes a bitch
Quiz created with MemeGen!

HElla fuckin tired tonight. Havent posted in awhile because ive been working full time. finals this week. well 1 math final on friday. fuck.

tomorrow is a busy day.

i love kareem and i miss justin and amy and cory

i wish i could hang out tonight..but i started sneezing hella today..and some mucuous has been moving its way down the back of my throat.

and a little coughing

 

Chris=death! yeah, you're dead now fella. ;-) that isn't a friendly wink.

Umm..I want to be a princess this weekend :D

PAYDAY=Friday

im getting a hair cut..and redying it.

need to get dad a fathers day gift

SO much shit on my mind. at least there is no room for..uh?????

thinking about him.

yeah. i like him. problem is..

yeah..too many.

So, I am working two jobs now. :) I am officially a working girl. I am so proud of myself! tehe! But anywho..

A lot of stuff is on my mind right now. I feel very productive..and I feel worth partying whenever I want now. I am home more too..which makes a good impression on my folks..and I get along with them better. Tomorrow I am going to Callies house to hang out and party it up since her parents are gone for the weekend. WOOHOO. I would be going to Wish's party thing tonight but it costs 10 dollars with a can of food..so yeah..thats out of the question especially since 1) I don't have 10 dollars and 2) Its all the way in Seattle..and I was just in Seattle yesterday.

I had to drive all the way to Mt. Vernon to get my food handlers permit. buh

Tomorrow I work at BK 9am-1pm then TDM 1:30pm to 4.

Lacey called me today!! I miss her so much!!

I am pretty tired tonight, but I really want to hang out with Kareem and maybe Justin. I miss them boys :'(. <3

I have a crush..or two..or seventy!

I went tanning again today. I almost look like a real live!

Freckles everywhere..

My aunt diane and cousin garett just arrived. so..g2g. ;-)

So Mara (me) As you can see..
Got two jobs..
well one at taco del mar

and the other PROBABLY at Burger King. Find out for sure tomorrow ;-)
my day has eben a long long tiring day full of
jury duty
school
interview 1 (got the job)
interview 2 (orientation at 3 tomorrow)
school
home

Exhausted..considering I went to bed aroudn 4:30 am and arose at 8am ish..

high light of the day

my family is proud of me
excahnged numbers with a new person. :)

last night was hella fun..was supposed to be relaxed lol

hella! oh man. so i helped move my aunt out from like 9-10am to 4pm. then i  babysit until like 9:30. i made a phone call and asked a friend if they could do me a favor and buy me a fifth of bacardi and a pint of absolut vodka. thanks to him. :) then omg. amy and i decided we'd get drunk alone for awhile, and decided that we'd make a few calls or texts. so we did. and we got like 7 people to come play with us! it was really fun. i got a hold of callie and fae...and they brought these kind of interesting people over named indio and raven..and they had a baby ferret. it was so cute! the name was junior..and it kind of bit me! the bastard. lol but before that we went to visit kareem rachel taylor steven seth and this girl at bowling. it was neat. but amy and i got tired of it because it was like a bunch of 15-16 year olds..so we decided to leave..and ended up getting this guys number..he was like "were having a party" so we exchanged numbers but he wasnt all that cute..but his friends may have been.

so thennnnnnnnn we all eventually ended up at amys house. it was Me, Amy, Raven, Indio, Callie, Fae, Kareem, Ian, Brandon, and..sigh!! this really really cool attractive guy named Nick.  So hot! mmmm

Apparently Shane (trollwithaxe) came over last night..but i didnt realize. the boys didnt leave until 5..in which i then passed out..after receiving a few great kisses.

we played spin the bottle and went aroudn the block half nude. GREAT stuff. it was really fun. im glad i had a good night :)

i did miss someone last night though.

more to the stories. just a short version of how much fun i had last night. it was all unplanned..and all just wrapped together. :) i love my men. and miss them :(
this cop needs to leave my house so i can go drink and have fun tonight

but i have an idea..
I HAVE AN IDEA. :-)

I had a good time in Seattle today.

I am definitely looking forward to next quarter. Its almost Spring time!! I love the Spring
As bitter as I might be, I know I will pull through. I've already had so many dreams before I had found out the truth, so my mind and heart was setting itself up for disappointment and heart break. I am so glad to have had it all confirmed..and looking at the confirmation wasn't as hard as I thought it would be coming from the persons fingers. (via keyboard) It's weird. I am somewhat relieved in a sense..and then again still a  little tender. I don't know why. Maybe its more the fact that someone that was supposed to be my good friend started dating the love of my life for 1 1/2 to 2 years after we pretty much ended things. Give or take a few months.
Oh well. What did I really get out of the relationship in the first place--besides my first love, mediocre to great sex, and the experience of a long-term relationship? I guess I've grown wiser--in some aspects..and I really have a good idea of what I look for in a person (personality wise).

Right now--I am not really looking for a relationship or sexual encounters. It does not sound appealing..
I could go on and on about who I want, who I don't want, etc, etc. But it doesn't matter. The fact is, I enjoy the freedom I have. Not to do just bad things, or to do whatever I please..but to have an option..and make a choice that only effects me. I'm glad I don't have to worry about anyone else, besides my family and friends ya know? But I don't have to lie to them. I don't lie to them. The only time I ever lie is when I am usually afraid..but even then I don't. So, I guess you could say..I lie to people I don't want to deal with..one in particular..but I guess thats still bad. Oh well, I will no longer have to deal with that, and I am somewhat happy about it.
So, in the end..I get what I want. 
To be left alone..and no longer be bothered. Although, I am still bothered..and still "lectured". oh well.
Sometimes I still can't help but think about the good times in Vegas..and what not, and a tear starts to roll down my cheek, but that was one good time..
I can still look forward to many good times, with many other friends, and few other boyfriends that I may have in the years to come.
So over all, my feelings right now are mediocre..and focused.
I am about ME, my close friends, my family, school, my animals..and that is all.
IF you want to be someone that I am about..just make better friends with me, and don't date the love of my life after we break up. You were never a real friend..I should have saw that in you, before I decided to become your friend.

GOOD LUCK ON FINALS EVERYONE..and have an awesome Spring Break!! ;-)

It has been confirmed. 
Healing, start now FUCKER.

I just want to move on with my life.
I want to be permanently happy. Although that is probably impossible. haha. Its ok to want that right?
I mean, I don't like being sad or depressed. I do like being alone at times..but then I have so much time to think, and I'd rather not do that..but if I'm alone and have nothing to think about I'll be bored..and no longer want to be alone. What a vicious cycle..
So I am moving on..working on it at least..
trying to maintain happiness..and surrounding myself with happy go lucky, non narrow minded, non gossip speaking people. I mean..Im not pointing at anyone directly. I just have a couple guidelines to being my friend. I mean, everyone does right? No drug use? I guess this would be narrow minded in a way, but I dont want to deal with anything unpleasant right now. I just want optimism, and love in my life..and SUNSHINE.
 

(I love) happiness..

be a fish I can catch please?

Why do you read my journal?
Why do you even bother texting my cell phone?
Why do you care if I am seeing someone else?

If you are angry with me, you have a right to be..
But If you want to talk to me..or invite me to coffee..don't expect me to jump out of my seat..
Don't you treat me like a drug-addict..because you don't know what I really do.
You hear from others..and believe what you REALLY want to believe. 
But not all of its true..


"I did more just because I was trying to look out for her..so she wouldnt do it all and die"
Sounds to me..and looks to me like they just wanted free drugs.

I would think like that because I am a drug addict, eh?
No. If anything..I am addicted to oranges..I eat those every day.

If you drink 1 beer a week, does that make you an alcoholic? I don't think so.
If you decide not to attend church..does that make you NOT a Christian?

To be honest, I've tried, I've used...and I really don't plan on anything anymore
No one has to believe that..I am not promising anything..Its a choice..a choice that I have made..Not because of you.
Not because of rumors..or because of the truth.
But because I have decided that it is not worth it.
I would prefer to keep my body healthy as long as I possibly can.

My apologies.

I love you all.

I hate to leave this entry up and online..but I KNOW..you'll read it.

and why??
Because you are curious?? Or because you still care?

Alright. This post may be lengthy..I'm not sure yet.

I've been spending an awful lot of time with my mom. I like it. Today we watched a movie together because we have similar class schedules.
This quarter is almost over, and I've reached most of my goals fitness wise. 
On the menu for dinner tonight was:
Salmon, Noodles, and Creamed Peas..I really like creamed peas. haha

I snacked on some reduced fat cheez its, they are my favorite..they just have more tang.
I love my friends, and I love Spring.
I am so excited to wear skirts and flip flops. 
I thought I wanted a boyfriend for awhile, but you know...I don't know what I want.
Nothing for now. :-) Friends at the best. I like to flirt occasionally..as long as it doesn't go anywhere.
I have my eye on a few cuteys. ;-) But no one in particular..and if they are..not worth mentioning right this second.
So, in the car on the way to my workout class, I decided I'd trim a lot of my hair off. It has been driving me insane..TIME TO CHOP IT OFF FOR SPRING/Summer..and go lighter. I'm sick of my natural color..now I see why I always dyed it cool combos. :-) Yeah, I've done it all..except I haven't had dreads..or extensions..although I have considered extensions. 

I saw Rachel walking and talking on her cellular telephone today..as I was leaving from visiting Jack the cat.
I was supposed to go to KZ's yesterday..but me and my social anxiety..I was too afraid to knock on the door..

I wonder what Amy's doing right now..I miss that lady.

wiping the bread crumbs off the bread board..
it makes me feel like i have been productive today..

Where have you been?

I'd rather not know. 
But I'll ask anyway..
because
curiosity killed the cat.
